Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Skilled \Skilled\, a. Having familiar knowledge united with readiness and dexterity in its application; familiarly acquainted with; expert; skillful; -- often followed by in; as, a person skilled in drawing or geometry. [1913 Webster]

skilled adj : having or showing or requiring special skill; "only the most skilled gymnasts make an Olympic team"; "a skilled surgeon has many years of training and experience"; "a skilled reconstruction of her damaged elbow"; "a skilled trade" [ant: {unskilled}]
